name: Collect & Conquer
description:
Description

Mini RTS game developed for the Akeneo Game Jam #4.

The main concept is you not control directly the units, only being able to recruit. Built playing with steering behaviors, stacked FSM, A* path finding and procedural map generation.

Credits & Artwork
